info.name: Mimesi
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Carlotta de Bevilacqua

MATERIALS:
Light, architectural space and natural landscape are the main elements of this project, based on principles of reduction of energy and materials. Through the dematerialization of volumes and mimetic transparency, and thanks to a slim recycled aluminium structure and methacrylate body, Mimesi does not hinder the vision, but silently integrates with the surrounding environment. When turned on it becomes a central element in the staging of peopleâ€™s lives, highlighting luminous writing on the cortex of the light.
